txt.en: 'My wife might not agree, but after a hard day's work, I need a drink of Old Barliman's beer!'
'Who's that stranger, sitting in the corner?'
'Old Tom swears he saw a goblin near the old marsh. Goblin...that must've been one ugly hobbit!'
'I can't believe what the iron-mongers are charging for a good plough blade. Smiths, ha! Thieves more like.'
